title: Netanyahu asks 'forgiveness' over hostage deaths as protests continue
content: It comes as Hamas said more hostages could be "returned to their families in shrouds" if a ceasefire isn't reached.
summary: It comes as Hamas said more hostages could be "returned to their families in shrouds" if a ceasefire isn't reached.

title: Netanyahu not doing enough to free Gaza hostages, says Biden
content: US president says he is 'very close' to presenting proposal to free remaining hostages as Israelis protest over latest deaths
summary: US president says he is 'very close' to presenting proposal to free remaining hostages as Israelis protest over latest deaths

title: US seizes Venezuelan President Maduro's plane
content: US officials say the aircraft was recovered in the Dominican Republic after having been purchased illegally.

title: Scholz urges firewall against far right after election win
content: The German Chancellor called the results of Sunday's state elections "worrying" and "bitter".
summary: The German Chancellor called the results of Sunday's state elections "worrying" and "bitter".

title: Video shows Titanic missing large section of railing
content: The discovery was made during a series of dives by underwater robots this summer.

title: Man accused of recruiting dozens of strangers to rape his wife
content: The men are accused of assaulting the woman, who was so heavily sedated she was not aware of the abuse, her lawyers say.

title: Russian missiles target Kyiv on first day of school year
content: Thousands of children returned to school just hours after a barrage of missiles was fired at the city.

title: Desperate for troops, Ukraine is training men in their 40s and 50s for battle

title: Ten Nigerian protesters charged with treason

content: Paris mayor Anne Hidalgo says she wants the rings to stay on the iconic monument indefinitely.

title: Russian 'spy whale' found dead off Norway

title: Defending champion Coco Gauff crashes out of US Open

title: Japan teen jumps to death, killing pedestrian below
content: The high school student jumped from a building in a crowded shopping district, hitting a woman below.
